entry.title: WIND WARNING ENDED, Twillingate
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:44 AM NST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Twillingate 04:30 AM NST Sunday 05 February 2023
Temperature: -7.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 74 %
Wind Chill: -19
Dewpoint: -11.5°C
Wind: WNW 55 km/h gust 68 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 this morning. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 18. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning late this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along parts of the coast this evening and after midnight. Wind becoming light overnight. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 6 in the afternoon.
